title: Ticket #5875: condor_config_val segfault
description:
On the HEAD of master (as of 2016-08-29), the following command will segfault, assuming that 'ddjdfd' (or any other string) does not resolve. 

condor_config_val -name ddjdfd START

Some versions (8.4.8) will correctly bail because they can't find that daemon. Other versions (8.4.4) appear to silently assume an invalid -name means to assume the local daemon.
creator: tlmiller
